description: Lists configured Amazon Q Business actions for any plugin type--both built-in and custom.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: If the response is truncated, Amazon Q Business returns this token, which you can use in a later request to list the next set of plugins.

nested_items.name: items
nested_items.description: An array of information on one or more plugins.

nested_items.name: actionIdentifier
nested_items.description: The identifier of an Amazon Q Business plugin action.

nested_items.name: displayName
nested_items.description: The display name assigned by Amazon Q Business to a plugin action. You can't modify this value.

nested_items.name: instructionExample
nested_items.description: An Amazon Q Business suggested prompt and end user can use to invoke a plugin action. This value can be modified and sent as input to initiate an action. For example:
Create a chat assistant task to find the root cause of a specific incident.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of an Amazon Q Business plugin action.
